Problem Statement Predict the student s performance in exam Type Regression Supervised Machine learning This data set includes scores from three exams and a variety of personal social and economic factors that have interaction effects upon students. Studeds having standard lunch and conpleted test preparation course gets good grade in examination. Above graphs shows that score 40 can be deciding score to state student is pass or fail. The task is to find following 1. Now grade can be allocated as follow A above 90B 80 89C 70 79D 55 69E 40 54F below 40 score in any subject Data analysisFrom above graphs we can conclude the followings 1. Test preparation course helps a lot to student to pass the examination. Grades are require to measure students performance in exam. Which major factors contribute to test outcomes Lunch test preparation course and parents education are major factors. How effective is the test preparation course 2. Percdentage needs to calculate to allocate grade. All features are categorical. Handling categorical variable1. Parent s education level also plays major role in students result. What would be the best way to improve student scores on each test If student get standard lunch and completed test preparation course will help student to score better in exam. Also if parents have degree or master level education then studens perfoms well in examination.
